arm_group.description: The pumpkin seed flour group received 20g/day of pumpkin seed flour during 12 weeks
The placebo group (cassava flour flavored) received 20g/day of cassava flour flavored during 12 weeks.

brief_summary.textblock:
This study aimed to evaluate the effect of weight loss diet combined with pumpkin seed flour
      consumption on diet improvement, weight loss, and glucose and cholesterol reduction in
      obese.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Weight Loss Diet and Pumpkin Seed Flour Consumption on Obese Women

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  age from 20 to 59 years old.

          -  body mass index above 30 kg/m2

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  diabetic

          -  loss weight before the research

          -  consumption of vitamins or dietary supplement.

          -  pregnancy

intervention.description: The pumpkin seed flour group received 20g/day of pumpkin seed flour during 12 weeks
The group placebo (cassava flour flavored) received 20g/day of cassava flour flavored during 12 weeks.

facility.name: Federal University of Rio de Janeiro

clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Hypoenergetic Diet Combined With Pumpkin Seed Flour Consumption on Obese Women

overall_official.affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

oversight_info.authority: Brazil: National Committee of Ethics in Research

primary_outcome.description: body weight (kg), body mass index (kg/m2), waist circumference (cm), neck circumference

secondary_outcome.description: total Cholesterol (mg/dl), LDL-cholesterol (mg/dl), HDL-cholesterol (mg/dl) and triglycerides (mg/dl)
